channel.title: Ascending317! New custom rsps - Free anger sword today!
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Free anger sword today![/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Ascending317![/size][/center]
[center][b]- Download Link -[/b]
https://dl.dropbox.com/s/yp677m46r7u1qr3/Ascending317.jar[/center]
[center][b]- Forums -[/b][/center]
[center]http://ascending317.invisionzone.com/[/center]
[center]Here at Ascending317 we care about our players and everything they've got to offer, We have an active staff team that are always willing to help We have frequent updates with a great developer We are always able to take feedback and are even happier to take your suggestions
[b]- Ascending317 Features -[/b]
100's of custom items Frequent updates Prestige system Dungeonering Working clan chat (with ranks) Working dice Boss pets (more to be added) Kiln cape and Fire cape Active staff 4 unique donator zones Custom bosses Achievements 24/7 up-time Loyal points system Summoning Pk point system Squel of fortune Mystery boxes
[b]- Bosses -[/b]
Corporal beast Tormented demons Miniboss Dragonbone boss Donator boss Nex Tormented Demons Sea troll queen Venenatis Callisto Vet'ion Scorpia Dagonoth kings [b] - Some Screenshots -[/b]
